title: Steel Gear
source: [[File:steelarmor.png|alt=|thumb|312x312px|Player wearing a set of Steel Armor]] Steel gear is the 2nd tier of gear available in Eterspire. They require level 10 [[Combat Skill|Combat]] to wear. They are dropped by [[Monsters Level 10 - 19]] or can be purchased from [[Roy & Leila's Shop]].
